p: In recent times, the re-emergence and the rapid spread of arboviruses in urban areas have become a serious problem that has concerned health authorities as well as the general population in many countries. The magnitude of the epidemics, the occurrence of severe cases with neurological manifestations and lethal outcomes, and severity of congenital malformations associated with infections occurred during pregnancy are the main threats of this new epidemiological situation [ 1, 2].
